welcome_message_body: Welcome to Melipilla, Chile! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Melipilla has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Osake
restaurants.description: Osake is a sushi restaurant located in Melipilla.
restaurants.address: Arturo Prat 763 (e/Pardo y Silva Chavez), 9580975 Melipilla, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile
